FuncDef: The display qos-profile application command displays information about the application of a QoS profile.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a QoS profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After configuring the qos-profile command on interfaces, you can run the display qos-profile application command to view information about the application of a QoS profile.
